Reviews.Title: “OK for a single night close to Central Station / Airport”
Reviews.Author: AsiaTravels2
Reviews.Content: hotel ok value cheap night layover close city airport train dont expect luxury service adequate reasonably clean convenience price 1 night stayed attending function close town night central whilst little claustrophobic windows probably street noise
